Text: Agreed. Sarah Jane was the best companion.

That is truly sad news!
I really loved "The Sarah Jane Adventures", although it was a childrens program!

So lets keep her memory alive then. I'll check on this torrent now and again in the future, and if it needs seeding, I'll be there.

Rest in peace Elisabeth Sladen, you'll be greatly missed!

R.I.P really the best companion
she'll live on in her episodes :)

If you are looking for Season 4, here you go:
https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5964421/The_Sarah_Jane_Adventures_-__Complete_Season_4_%28Xvid_MP3%29

Tom Baker was my Dr. Sarah Jane was his assistant .... and years go by .... when my son was 12 BBC Wales regenerated The Dr into something amazing and so my son was brought up with his Dr too. 
Some time later they did the same with Sarah Jane .... this down load is for my daughter ... she's 8 and absolutely loves it ... :big smile:  

Excellence .....
